channel.title: Vicki Mu on For Later Analysis
channel.description: Recent content in Vicki Mu on For Later Analysis

item.title: From Pixels to Predictions: Building a Transformer for Images
item.author: vymu@mit.edu (Vicki Mu)
item.description:
Originally published on Medium.

Convolutional neural networks have been the driving force behind almost every major breakthrough in computer vision — but what if they’ve been holding us back all along?

item.title: About Me
item.author: vymu@mit.edu (Vicki Mu)
item.description: I’m a sophomore at MIT studying AI and physics. This site is my public lab notebook—a space where I break down ideas, build things, and try to make sense of what I’m learning.
